meanings.sent1: The old car was rattening loudly down the road.
meanings.sent2: The wind rattening the windows made the house feel eerie.
meanings.sent3: The loose doorknob was rattening like a tiny drummer.
meanings.sent4: The hail rattening on the roof sounded like a thousand marbles falling.
meanings.sent5: The branches rattening against the window created a spooky atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of making a rattling noise.
meanings.sent1: The constant rattening of the pipes kept me up all night.
meanings.sent2: The sudden rattening from the attic startled the family.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful rattening with a toy mouse was entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic rattening of the train on the tracks was oddly soothing.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious rattening in the dark basement sent shivers down my spine.
